Any ideas? If i use a servlet runner constructor with no paramenters 
and then use the registerServlet function I have no problems. But I 
am wondering why the web.xml file that the tutorial uses creates a 
NULL servlet runner. Now I've traced into this and it actually ends 
up in the Thread class with a NULL pointer...I'm not really sure what 
to do with it, anyone else run into this? 

Tutorial found here:
http://www.httpunit.org/doc/tutorial/task1editor-initial.html

Here is the web.xml file i am using
http://www.httpunit.org/doc/tutorial/web.xml

Thanks in advance,

Spencer
